item.title: Bloom filters in Rust
item.description: Intro # A bloom filter is a data structure that allows you to quickly identify if some data has been previously added to the structure.

item.title: Type safety in Rust
item.description: Here is an interesting thing that shows why compiled languages are good, specifically why Rust is great.
